advancements.story.root.description: Find yourself in a world made of blocks
advancements.story.obtain_wooden_tool.de: Craft a wooden tool on a crafting table
advancements.story.obtain_raw_copper.des: Find and mine copper from ore
advancements.story.obtain_bronze_blend.d: Mix copper and tin to form a bronze alloy
advancements.story.obtain_bronze_tool.de: Craft a bronze tool from bronze ingots
advancements.story.obtain_iron_tool.desc: Craft an iron tool from iron ingots
